titles.title: Installment Sale Protection Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for installment reporting of certain gain from the sale of an interest in a service business.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/6/2003--Introduced. Installment Sale Protection Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make eligible for installment reporting any intangibles recapture gain from certain sales of an interest in a service business.
